channel.title: productivity on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in productivity on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: aarrr
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: AARRR framework We use the AARRR framework to measure and optimize every phase of a product by optimizing it through the insane focus on one metric at a time.

item.title: Adoption Of Pnpm
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We’re excited to share that the Dwarves team has officially decided to switch to pnpm as our primary package management tool.

item.title: Beyond The Title
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The Common Dilemma You’re only paid that much to do that much We only pay you that much if you can do only that much It’s the scenario that people measure and expect their effort should be traded into paychecks.

item.title: The Correct Way To Build Kpi
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: I have taken a week off from my office, packed up and headed to Dalat for a full-week meditation retreat. This method has been my sweet escape for the past 4 years, get-away from the chaotic pop-ups, notifications, messages, deadlines from work and normal life, to find the right balance for my energy and my mind as well.

item.title: Go The Extra Mile
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: A couple days ago, I was asked if I were ever a product person, what would I do to make the best out of it.

item.title: Resource Assignment
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: With the nature of consulting team, one member could be assigned to multiple projects at once or handle the work of a member in one project that take more than 100% of his/her time per week.

item.title: Blocking Distraction
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Finding solitude in information overwhelming world. Nowadays, we are connected 247, every minute passes by there are new things happens, new notifications, endless distractions.
